analyzed: saḥ ūnupūrveṇa vicaran yena daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya niveśanam tena upasaṃkrāmat

original: sa taṃ niveśanaṃ praviṣṭo'drākṣīt kanyāmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatāṃ nātidīrghāṃ nātihrasvāṃ nātisthūlāṃ nātikṛśāṃ nātigaurāṃ nātikṛṣṇāṃ prathamayauvanāvasthāṃ strīratnamiva khyāyamānām |
analyzed: sa tam niveśanam praviṣṭaḥ udrākṣīt kanyām abhirūpām prāsādikām darśanīyām paramayā śubha varṇa puṣkara tayā samanvāgatām na ati dīrghām na ati hrasvām na ati sthūlām na ati kṛśām na ati gaurām na ati kṛṣṇām prathama yauvana avasthām strī ratnam iva khyāyamānām

original: atha sā dārikā purohitasya caraṇau gṛhītvā evamāha-kena te mahābrāhmaṇa kāryam?
analyzed: atha sā dārikā purohitasya caraṇau gṛhītvā evam āha kena te mahā brāhmaṇa kāryam
purohitaḥ āha
śuddhodanasya tanayaḥ parama abhirūpaḥ
dvātriṃśa lakṣaṇa dharaḥ guṇa teja yuktaḥ
tena iti likhitāḥ vadhūnām

original: yasyā guṇāsti hi ime sa hi tasya patnī ||15 ||
analyzed: yasyāḥ hi ime sa hi tasya patnī
sa tasyāḥ tam lekham upanāmayati sma

original: atha sā dārikā taṃ gāthālekhaṃ vācayitvā smitamupadarśya taṃ purohitaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣat—
analyzed: atha sā dārikā tam gāthā lekham vācayitvā smitam upadarśya tam purohitam gāthayā adhyabhāṣat
mahyā iti brāhmaṇa guṇā anurūpa sarve
saḥ me patiḥ bhavatu saumya surūpa rūpaḥ

original: bhaṇahi kumāru yadi kārya ma hū vilamba
analyzed: yadi kārya vilamba
mā hīna prākṛta janena bhaveya vāsaḥ iti

original: atha sa khalu purohito rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiva tamarthamārocayati sma-dṛṣṭā mayā deva kanyā yā kumārasyānurūpā syāt |
analyzed: atha sa khalu purohitaḥ rājānam śuddhodanam upasaṃkramya eva tam artham ārocayati sma dṛṣṭā mayā deva kanyā yā kumārasya anurūpā syāt
āhakasya asau
āha daṇḍapāṇeḥ deva śākyasya duhitā
atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya etat abhavat durāsadaḥ kumāraḥ śubha adhimuktaḥ ca
prāyeṇa ca mātṛgrāmaḥ u saṃvidyamāna guṇaḥ api guṇānām ātmani prajānīte
yat nu aham aśoka bhāṇḍakāni kārayeyam
yāni kumāraḥ sarva dārikābhyaḥ anuprayacchet
tatra yasyām dārikāyām kumārasya cakṣuḥ abhiniveśyati
tām kumārasya varayiṣyāmi iti

original: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano'śokabhāṇḍāni kārayati sma suvarṇamayāni rūpyamayāni nānāratnamayāni |
analyzed: atha khalu rājā śuddhodana uśoka bhāṇḍāni kārayati sma suvarṇa mayāni rūpya mayāni nānā ratna mayāni

original: kārayitvā ca kapilavastuni mahānagare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa-saptame divase kumāro darśanaṃ dāsyati,
analyzed: kārayitvā ca kapilavastuni mahā nagare ghaṇṭā ghoṣaṇām kārayāmāsa saptame divase kumāraḥ darśanam dāsyati
aśoka bhāṇḍakāni ca dārikābhyaḥ viśrāṇayiṣyati
tatra sarva dārikābhiḥ saṃsthā āgāre saṃnipatitavyam iti

original: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase bodhisattvaḥ saṃsthāgāramupasaṃkramya bhadrāsane nyaṣīdat |
analyzed: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase bodhisattvaḥ saṃsthā āgāram upasaṃkramya bhadrāsane nyaṣīdat

original: rājāpi śuddhodano'dṛśyapuruṣān sthāpayati sma-yasyāṃ dārikāyāṃ kumārasya cakṣuḥ saṃniviśet,
analyzed: rājā api śuddhodanaḥ udṛśya puruṣān sthāpayati sma yasyām dārikāyām kumārasya cakṣuḥ saṃniviśet
tām mama ārocayadhvam iti

original: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvantyaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagare dārikāstāḥ sarvā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya darśanāya aśokabhāṇḍakāni ca pratigṛhītum ||
analyzed: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ yāvantyaḥ kapilavastuni mahā nagare dārikāḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ yena saṃsthā āgāraḥ yena ca bodhisattvaḥ tena upasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya darśanāya aśoka bhāṇḍakāni ca pratigṛhītum

original: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathāgatābhyastābhyo dārikābhyo'śokabhāṇḍakānyanuprayacchati sma |
analyzed: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ bodhisattvaḥ yathāgatābhyaḥ tābhyaḥ dārikābhyaḥ uśoka bhāṇḍakāni anuprayacchati sma

original: tāśca dārikā na śaknuvanti sma bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaśca soḍhum |
analyzed: tāḥ ca dārikāḥ na śaknuvanti sma bodhisattvasya śriyam tejaḥ ca soḍhum

original: tā aśokabhāṇḍakāni gṛhītvā śīghraṃ śīghrameva prakrāmanti sma ||
analyzed: tāḥ aśoka bhāṇḍakāni gṛhītvā śīghram śīghram eva prakrāmanti sma

original: atha daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
analyzed: atha daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākya kanyā

original: sā dāsīgaṇaparivṛtā puraskṛtā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat |
analyzed: sā dāsī gaṇa parivṛtā puraskṛtā yena saṃsthā āgāraḥ yena ca bodhisattvaḥ tena upasaṃkrāmat
upasaṃkramya ekānte sthāt bodhisattvam animeṣābhyām nayanābhyām prekṣamāṇā
tat yadā bodhisattvena sarvāṇi aśoka bhāṇḍāni dattāni

original: tadā sā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya prahasitavadanā bodhisattvamevamāha-kumāra kiṃ te mayāpanītaṃ yastvaṃ māṃ vimānayasi?
analyzed: tadā sā bodhisattvam upasaṃkramya prahasita vadanā bodhisattvam evam āha kumāra kim te mayā apanītam yaḥ tvam mām vimānayasi
āhanā aham tvām vimānayāmi
api tu khalu punar tvam abhi paścāt āgatā iti
sa tasyai ca aneka śata sahasra mūlyam aṅgulīyakam nirmucya prādāt
sā prāha edam aham kumāra tava antikāt arhāmi
āha emāni madīyāni ābharaṇāni gṛhyatām
sā āhana vayam kumāram vyalaṃkariṣyāmaḥ
alaṃkariṣyāmaḥ vayam kumāram
iti uktvā sā kanyā prakrāmat

original: tatastairguhyapuruṣai rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiṣa vṛttānto nivedito'bhūt-deva daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
analyzed: tatas taiḥ guhya puruṣaiḥ rājānam śuddhodanam upasaṃkramya eṣa vṛttāntaḥ niveditaḥ bhūt deva daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākya kanyā
tasyām kumārasya cakṣuḥ niviṣṭam
muhūrtam ca tayoḥ saṃlāpaḥ bhūt

original: ityetatkhalu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā śuddhodano daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya purohitaṃ dautyena preṣayati sma-yā te duhitā,
analyzed: iti etat khalu vacanam śrutvā rājā śuddhodanaḥ daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya purohitam dautyena preṣayati smayā te duhitā
sā mama kumārasya pradīyatām iti
daṇḍapāṇiḥ āha ārya kumāraḥ gṛhe sukha saṃvṛddhaḥ

original: asmākaṃ cāyaṃ kuladharmaḥ śilpajñasya kanyā dātavyā nāśilpajñasyeti |
analyzed: asmākam ca ayam kula dharmaḥ śilpa jñasya kanyā dātavyā na a śilpa jñasya iti
kumāraḥ ca na śilpa jñaḥ na asi dhanuṣkalāpa yuddha sa ālambha vidhi jñaḥ
tat katham a śilpa jñāya aham duhitaram dāsyāmi
iti etat ca rājñaḥ prativeditam
tatas rājñaḥ etat abhavat dvis api idam aham saha dharmeṇa coditaḥ

original: yadāpi mayoktaṃ kasmācchākyakumārāḥ kumārasyopasthānāya nāgacchantīti tadāpyahamabhihitaḥ-kiṃ vayaṃ maṇḍakasyopasthānaṃ kariṣyāma iti |
analyzed: yadā api mayā uktam kasmāt śākya kumārāḥ kumārasya upasthānāya na āgacchanti iti tadā api aham abhihitaḥ kim vayam maṇḍakasya upasthānam kariṣyāmaḥ iti
etarhi api evam iti pradhyāyan niṣaṇṇaḥ bhūt
bodhisattvaḥ ca enam vṛttāntam aśroṣīt
śrutvā ca yena rājā śuddhodanaḥ tena upasaṃkrāmat
upasaṃkramya evam āha deva kim idam dīna manāḥ tiṣṭhasi
rājā āha alam te kumāra anena
kumāraḥ āhat eva sarvathā tāvat avaśya bhevam ākhyātavyam

original: yāvattrirapi bodhisattvo rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ paripṛcchati sma ||
analyzed: yāvat tris api bodhisattvaḥ rājānam śuddhodanam paripṛcchati sma

original: tato rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvāya tāṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma |
analyzed: tatas rājā śuddhodanaḥ bodhisattvāya tām prakṛtim ārocayati sma

original: tāṃ śrutvā bodhisattva āha-deva asti punariha nagare kaścidyo mayā sārdhaṃ samarthaḥ śilpena śilapamupadarśayitum?
analyzed: tām śrutvā bodhisattvaḥ āha deva asti punar iha nagare kaścid yaḥ mayā sārdham samarthaḥ śilpena śilapam upadarśayitum

original: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ prahasitavadano bodhisattvamevamāha-śakyasi punastvaṃ putra śilpamupadarśayitum?
analyzed: tatas rājā śuddhodanaḥ prahasita vadanaḥ bodhisattvam evam āha śakyasi punar tvam putra śilpam upadarśayitum
saḥ āha bāḍham śakyāmi deva
tena hi saṃnipātyantām sarva śilpa jñāḥ
yeṣām puratas svam śilpam upadarśayiṣyāmi

original: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagaravare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayati sma-saptame divase kumāraḥ svaṃ śilpamupadarśayati |
analyzed: tatas rājā śuddhodanaḥ kapilavastuni mahā nagara vare ghaṇṭā ghoṣaṇām kārayati sma saptame divase kumāraḥ svam śilpam upadarśayati
tatra sarva śilpa jñaiḥ saṃnipatitavyam

original: tatra saptame divase pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni saṃnipatitānyabhūvan |
analyzed: tatra saptame divase pañca mātrāṇi śākya kumāra śatāni saṃnipatitāni abhūvan

original: daṇḍapāṇeśca śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā jayapatākā sthāpitābhūt-yo vā atra asidhanuṣkalāpayuddhasālambheṣu jeṣyati,
analyzed: daṇḍapāṇeḥ ca śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākya kanyā jayapatākā sthāpitā abhūtyaḥ vā atra asi dhanuṣkalāpa yuddha sa ālambheṣu jeṣyati
tasya eṣā bhaviṣyati iti

original: tatra sarvapurato devadattaḥ kumāro nagarādabhiniṣkrāmati sma |
analyzed: tatra sarva puratas devadattaḥ kumāraḥ nagarāt abhiniṣkrāmati sma

original: śvetaśca hastī mahāpramāṇo bodhisattvasyārthe nagaraṃ praveśyate sma |
analyzed: śvetaḥ ca hastī mahā pramāṇaḥ bodhisattvasya arthe nagaram praveśyate sma

original: tatra devadattaḥ kumāra īrṣyayā ca śākyabalamadena ca mattaḥ |
analyzed: tatra devadattaḥ kumāraḥ īrṣyayā ca śākya bala madena ca mattaḥ

original: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ vāmena pāṇinā śuṇḍāyāṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā capeṭayā ekaprahāreṇaiva hato'bhūt ||
analyzed: sa tam hasti nāgam vāmena pāṇinā śuṇḍāyām gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā capeṭayā eka prahāreṇa eva hataḥ bhūt
tasya anantaram sundarananda kumāraḥ abhiniṣkrāmati sma
sā udrākṣīt tam hasti nāgam nagara dvāre hatam
dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat kena ayam hataḥ iti
tatra mahā jana kāyaḥ āha devadattena iti
saḥ āha aśobhanam idam devadattasya

original: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhītvā nagaradvārādapakarṣati sma ||
analyzed: sa tam hasti nāgam lāṅgūle gṛhītvā nagara dvārāt apakarṣati sma
tad anantaram bodhisattvaḥ ratha abhirūḍhaḥ abhiniṣkrāmati sma
adrākṣīt bodhisattvaḥ tam hastinam hatam
dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat kena ayam hataḥ iti
āhuḥ devadattena iti
āha aśobhanam devadattasya
kena punar asmāt nagara dvārāt apakarṣitaḥ iti
āhuḥ sundaranandena iti
āha śobhanam idam sundaranandasya
kim tu mahā kāyaḥ iyam sattvaḥ
saḥ uyam klinnaḥ sarva nagaram daurgandhena sphuriṣyati iti

original: tataḥ kumāro rathasya evaikaṃ pādaṃ bhūmau prasārya pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhitvā sapta prākārān sapta ca parikhānatikramya bahirnagarasya krośamātre prakṣipati sma |
analyzed: tatas kumāraḥ rathasya eva ekam pādam bhūmau prasārya pādāṅguṣṭhena tam hasti nāgam lāṅgūle gṛhitvā sapta prākārān sapta ca parikhān atikramya bahis nagarasya krośa mātre prakṣipati sma

original: yatra va pradeśe sa hastī patitastasmin pradeśe mahadbilaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ yatsāṃprataṃ hastigartetyabhidhīyate ||
analyzed: yatra pradeśe sa hastī patitaḥ tasmin pradeśe mahat bilam saṃvṛttam yat sāṃpratam hastigartā iti abhidhīyate
tatra deva manujāḥ śata sahasrāṇi hāhākāra kilakilā prakṣveḍita śata sahasrāṇi prāmuñcan
caila vikṣepān ca akārṣuḥ
gagana tala gatāḥ ca devaputrāḥ ime gāthāḥ bhāṣanta
matta gaja indra gatīnām pādāṅguṣṭha talena gaja indram

original: sapta purāparikhā atikramya kṣiptu bahiḥ svapurātu ayaṃ hi ||17 ||
analyzed: sapta purā parikhāḥ atikramya bahis
niḥsaṃśayam eṣa sumedhāḥ māna balena samucchrita kāyān
bahirdhā eka kṣapiṣyati prajña balena

original: iti hi pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni nagarānniṣkamya yenānyatamaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo yatra śākyakumārāḥ śilpamupadarśayanti sma tenopasaṃkrāman
analyzed: iti hi pañca mātrāṇi śākya kumāra śatāni nagarāt niṣkamya yena anyatamaḥ pṛthivī pradeśaḥ yatra śākya kumārāḥ śilpam upadarśayanti sma tena upasaṃkrāman

original: rājāpi śuddhodano mahallakamahallakāśca śākyā mahāṃśca janakāyo yenāsau pṛthivīpradeśastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya cānyeṣāṃ ca śākyakumārāṇāṃ śilpaviśeṣaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ ||
analyzed: rājā api śuddhodanaḥ mahallaka mahallakāḥ ca śākyāḥ mahān ca jana kāyaḥ yena asau pṛthivī pradeśaḥ tena upasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya ca anyeṣām ca śākya kumārāṇām śilpa viśeṣam draṣṭu kāmāḥ

original: tatra ādita eva ye śākyakumārā lipyāṃ paṭuvidhijñāste bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ lipiṃ viśeṣayanti sma |
analyzed: tatra āditas eva ye śākya kumārāḥ lipyām paṭu vidhi jñāḥ te bodhisattvena sārdham lipim viśeṣayanti sma

original: tatra taiḥ śākyairviśvāmitra ācāryaḥ sākṣī sthāpito'bhūt-sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo'tra kumāro lipijñāne viśiṣyate yadi vā lekhyato yadi vā bahulipiniryāṇataḥ |
analyzed: tatra taiḥ śākyaiḥ viśvāmitraḥ ācāryaḥ sākṣī sthāpitaḥ bhūt sa tvam vyavalokaya katamaḥ utra kumāraḥ lipi jñāne viśiṣyate yadi vā lekhyataḥ yadi vā bahu lipi niryāṇataḥ

original: atha viśvāmitra ācāryaḥ pratyakṣo bodhisattvasya lipijñāne smitamupadarśayannime gāthe'bhāṣata—
analyzed: atha viśvāmitraḥ ācāryaḥ pratyakṣaḥ bodhisattvasya lipi jñāne smitam upadarśayan ime gāthe bhāṣata
ca deva loke gandharva loke ipi asura indra loke

original: yāvanti kecillipi sarvaloke tatraiṣa pāraṃgatu śuddhasattvaḥ ||19 ||
analyzed: yāvanti sarva loke tatra eṣa śuddha sattvaḥ

original: nāmāpi yūyaṃ ca ahaṃ ca teṣāṃ lipīna jānāma na cākṣarāṇām |
analyzed: nāma api yūyam ca aham ca teṣām jānāma na ca akṣarāṇām

original: yānyeṣa jānāti manuṣyacandro ahamatra pratyakṣu vijeṣyate'yam ||20 ||
analyzed: yāni eṣa jānāti manuṣya candraḥ aham atra pratyakṣu vijeṣyatā iyam
śākyāḥ āhuḥ viśiṣyatām tāvat kumāraḥ lipi jñāne
saṃkhyā jñāne kumāraḥ viśeṣayitavyaḥ jijñāsyaḥ ca

original: tatrārjuno nāma śākyagaṇako mahāmātraḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanāsu pāraṃgataḥ,
analyzed: tatra arjunaḥ nāma śākya gaṇakaḥ mahāmātraḥ saṃkhyā gaṇanāsu pāraṃgataḥ

original: sa sākṣī sthāpito'bhūt-sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo'tra kumāro viśiṣyate saṃkhyājñānata iti |
analyzed: sa sākṣī sthāpitaḥ bhūt sa tvam vyavalokaya katamaḥ utra kumāraḥ viśiṣyate saṃkhyā jñānataḥ iti
tatra bodhisattvaḥ ca uddiśati sma
ekaḥ ca śākya kumāraḥ nikṣipati sma
na ca pariprāpayati sma

original: bodhisattvasyaika dvau trayaścatvāraḥ pañcadaśa viṃśattriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśacchataṃ yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapatkāle nikṣipanti
analyzed: dvau trayaḥ catvāraḥ pañcadaśa viṃśat triṃśat catvāriṃśat pañcāśat śatam yāvat pañca api śākya kumāra śatāni yugapad kāle nikṣipanti
na ca pariprāpayanti sma
tatas bodhisattvaḥ āha uddiśata yūyam
aham nikṣepsyāmi iti
tatra eka śākya kumāraḥ bodhisattvasya uddiśati sma
na ca pariprāpayati sma

original: dvāvapi trayo'pi pañcāpi daśāpi viṃśatyapi triṃśadapi catvāriṃśadapi pañcāśadapi yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapaduddiśanti sma |
analyzed: dvau api trayaḥ api pañca api daśa api viṃśatī api triṃśat api catvāriṃśat api pañcāśat api yāvat pañca api śākya kumāra śatāni yugapad uddiśanti sma

original: na ca pariprāpayanti sma bodhisattvasya nikṣipataḥ ||
analyzed: na ca pariprāpayanti sma bodhisattvasya nikṣipataḥ
